title: ONGC Videsh sells Dec-loading Russian Sokol crude at highest premium in 5 yrs-sources
text:
ONGC Videsh sells Dec-loading Russian Sokol crude at highest premium in 5 yrs-sources

Commodities 12 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 10:00)

© Reuters. ONGC Videsh sells Dec-loading Russian Sokol crude at highest premium in 5 yrs-sources SINGAPORE, Oct 7 (Reuters) - * Indian oil explorer ONGC Videsh ONVI.NS has sold a cargo of Russian Sokol crude at a premium of around $8.3 a barrel to Dubai quotes via a spot tender, the highest since mid-2014 SOK-DUB , three trade sources told Reuters on Monday * The 700,000-barrel cargo was offered to load between Dec. 7-13 * The buyer of the cargo was not immediately known * Prior to this, Exxon Mobil (NYSE: ) sold two November-loading Russian Sokol crude cargoes at premiums of around $6.9 a barrel to Dubai quotes

ONGC Videsh sells Dec-loading Russian Sokol crude at highest premium in 5 yrs-sources
